column1: F&P Icon™ Novo CPAP with Humidifier and ThermoSmart™ Tube,ICONNAN/900ICON208,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,Fisher & Paykel,"<div id=""Overview"">

column2: Paykel humidification design that is proven to provide more humidity and comfort for the user.

column1: <li> Includes ThermoSmart Heated Tubing for increased humidification and decreased chance of &quot
column2: rain out&quot

column1: • Fully Integrated Humidifier - Small, compact CPAP design that includes a full humidifier with a very easy-to-fill water chamber.
• Compliance Reporting - Track how much you are using your CPAP using onboard menus or through SmartStick data collection.
• SmartDial One-Touch Navigation - User-friendly controls designed for the user.
• Proportional Ramp - Adjust naturally to therapy as you fall asleep because the machine gradually increases your pressure over a specified period of time.
• Altitude Adjustment - Manually change your altitude settings to compensate for higher elevations.
• Convenient Elbow-to-Tubing Connection - Tubing swivels freely from its rotating connection to the machine.
Known for their advanced humidification technology, Fisher &amp
column2: Paykel has introduced the F&amp
column3: P ICON series of CPAP machines. Designed to address your sleep therapy needs through a pleasing external design that fits into any bedroom, effective humidification, and additional comfort and convenience features, the F&amp
column4: P ICON Novo is a great choice for your CPAP treatment. The ICON Novo is the entry-level unit in the ICON family.

column2: P Novo incorporates patented ThermoSmart Technology that provides increased humidification, thereby increasing the comfort of your CPAP use. Many side effects of CPAP use can be attributed to dry air blowing into the airway. During normal inhalation, the human body can easily humidify the air at the correct level, but when the air coming in on each inhale is increased greatly (as it is while using a CPAP blower), the body cannot keep up. Side effects include dry mouth, inflamed sinuses, dry eyes and much more. The F&amp
column3: P ICON Novo seeks to alleviate these uncomfortable issues by assuring that, with each breathe, you receive the optimal level of humidification.

column1: This CPAP and humidifier package includes the optional F&amp
column2: P ThermoSmart Heated Tubing. This heated tubing works to reduce the common phenomenon called &#x201C
column3: rain out&#x201D
column4: . Rain out occurs when warm air hits the colder area outside of the machine, causing condensation and water build-up to occur in the tubing. The ThermoSmart tube has heated coils that reduce this condensation and increases the amount of humidity that makes it to your airway.

column1: The ICON Novo also includes many other features that make CPAP therapy more comfortable and convenient for you. It&#x2019
column2: s small, travel-friendly design includes a fully integrated humidifier, so you have your CPAP and humidifier with you whenever you travel. Compliance reporting can tell you how much you&#x2019
column3: ve been using your CPAP. Easy to use controls make the F&amp
column4: P ICON Novo a good machine for even the least tech-savvy person, and once your machine is set-up, using it is as simple as pressing and turning the SmartDial control. Other features such as alarm clock, manual altitude adjustment, and proportional ramp mean that the ICON family of CPAP machines has everything you need to be successful in your CPAP treatment.

column1: • Fully Integrated Humidifier - Small, compact CPAP design that includes a full humidifier with a very easy-to-fill water chamber.

column3: P ICON series of CPAP machines. Designed to address your sleep therapy needs through a pleasing external design that fits into any bedroom, effective humidification, and additional comfort and convenience features, the F&amp
column4: P ICON Auto Auto-Adjusting CPAP is a great choice for your treatment.

column1: An APAP (automatic positive airway pressure) machine, the ICON Auto adjusts your pressure throughout the night to ensure that you receive the optimal level of PAP therapy at every stage of sleep. Proven to reduce common side effects from CPAP treatment and the highest level of technology currently available, the automatic pressure adjusting machines are becoming the most sought after type of treatment.

column2: P Auto incorporates patented ThermoSmart Technology that provides increased humidification, thereby increasing the comfort of your CPAP use. Many side effects of CPAP use can be attributed to dry air blowing into the airway. During normal inhalation, the human body can easily humidify the air at the correct level, but when the air coming in on each inhale is increased greatly (as it is while using a CPAP blower), the body cannot keep up. Side effects include dry mouth, inflamed sinuses, dry eyes and much more. The F&amp
column3: P ICON Auto seeks to alleviate these uncomfortable issues by assuring that, with each breathe, you receive the optimal level of humidification.

column1: The ICON Auto also includes many other features that make CPAP therapy more comfortable and convenient for you. It&#x2019
column2: s small, travel-friendly design includes a fully integrated humidifier, so you have your CPAP and humidifier with you whenever you travel. Compliance reporting and data collection can tell you how much you&#x2019
column3: ve been using your CPAP and how well that CPAP has been working (called &#x201C
column4: efficacy data&#x201D
column5: ). Easy to use controls make the F&amp
column6: P ICON Auto a good machine for even the least tech-savvy person, and once your machine is set-up, using it is as simple as pressing and turning the SmartDial control. Other features such as alarm clock, auto-altitude adjustment, advanced leak compensation, and proportional ramp mean that the ICON family of CPAP machines has everything you need to be successful in your CPAP treatment.

column1: An APAP (automatic positive airway pressure) machine, the ICON Auto adjusts your pressure throughout the night to ensure that you receive the optimal level of PAP therapy at every stage of sleep. Proven to reduce common side effects from CPAP treatment and the highest level of technology currently available, the automatic pressure adjusting machines are becoming the most sought after type of treatment.

column2: P Auto incorporates patented ThermoSmart Technology that provides increased humidification, thereby increasing the comfort of your CPAP use. Many side effects of CPAP use can be attributed to dry air blowing into the airway. During normal inhalation, the human body can easily humidify the air at the correct level, but when the air coming in on each inhale is increased greatly (as it is while using a CPAP blower), the body cannot keep up. Side effects include dry mouth, inflamed sinuses, dry eyes and much more. The F&amp
column3: P ICON Auto seeks to alleviate these uncomfortable issues by assuring that, with each breathe, you receive the optimal level of humidification.

column1: This CPAP and humidifier package includes the optional F&amp
column2: P ThermoSmart Heated Tubing. This heated tubing works to reduce the common phenomenon called &#x201C
column3: rain out&#x201D
column4: . Rain out occurs when warm air hits the colder area outside of the machine, causing condensation and water build-up to occur in the tubing. The ThermoSmart tube has heated coils that reduce this condensation and increases the amount of humidity that makes it to your airway.

column1: The ICON Auto also includes many other features that make CPAP therapy more comfortable and convenient for you. It&#x2019
column2: s small, travel-friendly design includes a fully integrated humidifier, so you have your CPAP and humidifier with you whenever you travel. Compliance reporting and data collection can tell you how much you&#x2019
column3: ve been using your CPAP and how well that CPAP has been working (called &#x201C
column4: efficacy data&#x201D
column5: ). Easy to use controls make the F&amp
column6: P ICON Auto a good machine for even the least tech-savvy person, and once your machine is set-up, using it is as simple as pressing and turning the SmartDial control. Other features such as alarm clock, auto-altitude adjustment, advanced leak compensation, and proportional ramp mean that the ICON family of CPAP machines has everything you need to be successful in your CPAP treatment.

column1: • Fully Integrated Humidifier - Small, compact CPAP design that includes a full humidifier with a very easy-to-fill water chamber.
• Compliance Reporting and SmartStick Data Collection - Track how much you are using your CPAP as well as how effective that treatment is with your ICON.
• SmartDial One-Touch Navigation - User-friendly controls designed for the user.
• Proportional Ramp - Adjust naturally to therapy as you fall asleep because the machine gradually increases your pressure over a specified period of time.
• Auto-Altitude Adjustment - Your machine will compensate for any changes in altitude automatically.
• Convenient Elbow-to-Tubing Connection - Tubing swivels freely from its rotating connection to the machine.
Known for their advanced humidification technology, Fisher &amp
column2: Paykel has introduced the F&amp
